org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce

Class WALPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.WALPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public class WALPlayer
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    A tool to replay WAL files as a M/R job. The WAL can be replayed for a set of tables or all tables, and a time range can be provided (in milliseconds). The WAL is filtered to the passed set of tables and the output can optionally be mapped to another set of tables. WAL replay can also generate HFiles for later bulk importing, in that case the WAL is replayed for a single table only.

      Deprecated. 
      Use WALPlayer.WALCellMapper. Will be removed from 3.0 onwards
      protected static class  WALPlayer.WALMapper
      A mapper that writes out Mutation to be directly applied to a running HBase instance.
